TopicTitle: How Much Science (Total) to Complete Tech Tree?

Articles.Content:
I was wondering if someone else has already done the math for the total amount of Science required to unlock the entire tech tree in career mode.

Edited October 22, 2013 by Commander Zoom

All right. Some extensive save file editing (Maxed out my Sci. Number and bought everything) brings the total to...

10738.

Ironically I was considering just making an informational post about this, but I figured someone else had beaten me to it. That's what I get for not searching, huh?
